name: Fails to create an account to user with invalid document information
scenarioId: classpath:features/account/create_account:Fails to create an account to user with invalid document information
methodName: Fails to create an account to user with invalid document information

testSteps.description: Given a client for account creation with document identification: document type "NATIONAL_ID", document "03485203948", country "PT"
And the document for the client requesting the account creation is invalid
And the backoffice operation is from the agency "0001"
When there is no user with the document information

reportData.title: User Account Creations Document in Request

testSteps.description: Then the client's account is not created

reportData.title: User Bank Account Creations Response
reportData.contents: <404 NOT_FOUND Not Found,RestResponse(message=User Not Found for documents., data=null),[content-type:"application/json", date:"Mon, 23 Dec 2024 23:35:47 GMT", transfer-encoding:"chunked"]>

userStory.narrative:
For a client to be able to do banking transactions as a Tiny Bank client, he needs to have an account.

  **As a** Tiny Bank client
  **I want to** create a bank account
  **So that I can** do bank transactions through Tiny Bank

title: Fails to create an account to user with invalid document information

rule.name: The user can create a bank account if he is already registered
